course_title: Frsh Seminar: African Studies: African & Indigenous Histories
class_notes:
(Same as HIST 190 1, AAS 190 2, and AMST 190 1)
(Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only)
(Complete Topic: African-Indigenous Histories of North America)
course_description: Introduces first-year students to the interdisciplinary field of African Studies, including historical context, sources, and methods of inquiry; aims to improve critical reading, analytical, and writing skills in small group discussion.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4590, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: M. Lowery, Status: Closed
